{{cpp/memory/unique_ptr/title|operator bool}}
{{cpp/memory/unique_ptr/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|notes={{mark|constexpr since C++23}}|1=
explicit operator bool() const noexcept;
}}

Checks whether {{c|*this}} owns an object, i.e. whether {{lc|get()}} {{tt|1= !=}} {{c|nullptr}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if {{c|*this}} owns an object, {{c|false}} otherwise.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;memory&gt;

int main()
{
    std::unique_ptr&lt;int&gt; ptr(new int(42));
  
    if (ptr)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "before reset, ptr is: " &lt;&lt; *ptr &lt;&lt; '\n';
    ptr.reset();
    (ptr ? (std::cout &lt;&lt; "after reset, ptr is: " &lt;&lt; *ptr)
        : (std::cout &lt;&lt; "after reset ptr is empty")) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
before reset, ptr is: 42
after reset ptr is empty
}}
